page.shortlink: ux control properties javascript onmouse over
page.description: Fires when the user moves the mouse cursor over the control.

description.p: An object that contains properties and methods for inspecting and manipulating the browser event. This object can be referenced in JavaScript added to the event, either through Action Javascript or using *[ui:Text Mode]*.

discussion.p: The *[ui:onMouseOver]* event is triggered when the user moves the mouse cursor over the control.
